job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Job Descriptionltbrgtltbrgt           Experienced and fully engaged in Software Development Life Cycle SDLCltbrgt           Design code and debug applications in various software languagesltbrgt           Experience in a technical role such as software engineer solutions engineer or similar ltbrgt           Knowledge on Code analysis requirements analysis software review identification of code metrics system risk analysis software reliability analysisltbrgt           Good communication skills and ability to articulate tech issues accurately and succinctly in a manner that business users can understand and supportltbrgt           Azure Knowledge is an added advantageltbrgt           Experience in production support and customer interactionltbrgt           Delivers Professional Services to sound technical business and professional standards while ensuring strong customer satisfaction and success ltbrgt           Provides technical design and construction expertise to Customer implementations and deploymentsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt	Time of operation This track will be in 24X7 shift model Therefore candidates should be flexible to cover during holidays and weekends to accommodate MS rosterltbrgt
